basics.name: Jacob Molin
basics.currentTitel: M.Sc. student in Media Tech. and Engineering

profile: Driven, analytical and problem-solving-loving M.Sc. student with a big interest in technology, creation and logical thinking.
profile2: With experience in music production, customer service and logistics I have a unique insight in working with and delivering results in teams with many different types of personalities. I'm curious, take initiatives and is always looking on how to improve products and workflows. I'm interested in exploring how technology, with the help of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and programming in general, can be used to make life better and more fun for people. I thrive on new challenges and love making people laugh!

education.degree: M.Sc. in Media Technology and Engineering
education.description: Focus on programming and system development. Courses in Machine Learning, AI, Big Data Analytics, Neural Networks and more. Expected graduation June 2022. Current GPA: 4.13 / 5.0 (Grades are given in U, 3, 4, 5). Currently in my penultimate year.
education.subDescription: In a group of seven where we researched implementation methods and developed an online price comparison service which collects data by web scraping online stores. My focus laid on collecting, comparing and organizing data by writing Python scripts. The project has continued after the course’s end (see more under Portfolio).

education.degree: Audio Engineering Certificate (Music and Post Production Audio)

work.summary: Employed by Linköping University to tutor students in programming during two sessions per week. Students drop in and ask programming-related questions. Most questions regarded C++, JavaScript and MATLAB.

work.position: Location / Production Assistant on film sets
work.summary: Setting up and maintaining film location sets as well as driving actors, crew and equipment to/from location for projects like "Solsidan" (movie) and "Hassel" (TV series).
Recording and Audio Engineer for artists like Zara Larsson, Dua Lipa, Rev Run and Jared Leto. Music producer for artists like Broderick Batts, Taps and Diana Ebe.
Led sports activities for hotel guests during the day and running sound and light for the stage shows during the night for one season at a hotel on the Spanish island Mallorca.
Full-time periodically and part-time during studies.

work.position: Various summer and part time jobs
work.summary: Like store clerk at Hemköp (present), outdoor cinema technician, janitor and warehouse worker.

commissionOfTrust.summary: As one of two auditors, being responsible for auditing the accounting and financial situation of NAFFI for the academic year 2019/2020.
I was responsible for running board meetings and ultimately responsible for the weekly and overall operations.

Projects in and outside of studies.name: Media Technology - Bachelor Project
Projects in and outside of studies.summary: In a group of seven where we researched implementation methods and developed an online clothing price comparison service which collects data through webscraping online clothing stores. My focus laid on collecting, comparing and organizing data. Implemented in Python.

Projects in and outside of studies.name: Project in the course "Audio Physics"
Projects in and outside of studies.summary: Developed, in a group of three, an online frequency spectrum analyzer with JavaScript and React.

Projects in and outside of studies.name: Project in the course "Communication and User Interface"
Projects in and outside of studies.summary: With focus on the user interface, the group of four developed an application for diabetics to log the blood sugar and carbohydrate intake to calculate a bolus dose of insulin. The goal was to simplify the everyday life of diabetics and letting them spend less time managing their disease. The application was developed as a mobile phone adapted website using with JavaScript, React and Node,js and was named "diatot".

Projects in and outside of studies.name: Project in the course "Machine Learning for Social Media"
Resume and portfolio website: jacobmolin.com
Projects in and outside of studies.summary: Developed my own resume and portfolio website for fun! Implemented with React and Next.js

internships.summary: Various recording / audio engineer internships in professional studios with international producers and songwriters like Al Shux (Jay-Z, Alicia Keys) and David Jost (Selena Gomez, Tokio Hotel). Among many things, I recorded A-list artists, built a vocal booth and rewired an entire studio.

interests: Playing and listening to music, exercising, experiencing nature, listening to podcasts.
